help.title: Understanding: Regulatory Watch
help.why: Regulatory Watch keeps you informed of the latest developments in AI governance. It automatically aggregates relevant news and uses AI to provide concise summaries.
help.how:
1. Check the AI summary at the top for a weekly overview.
2. Browse recent articles in the list.
3. Click 'Summarize' to get an AI summary of an article.
4. Click 'Read article' to access the full source.
